sql.name: accidentacceptlink
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1),t.c700000001,t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间,t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题,t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业,t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {600} t,{500} item,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) pro,{200} u,{300} g,{400} gu where item.c802800005=t.c802000018 and t.c1=pro.c700020001 and t.c700000001=pro.c700020002 and pro.c700020010=u.c630000001 and pro.C700020011 in ('已完成','处理中') and u.c1=gu.c620000028 and g.c1=gu.c620000027 {2} {3} {4} {6}
